text:
The latest version of Ant(1.5) doesn't seem to support JBOSS CMP deployment 
task. It does not bundle the jbosscmp-jdbc.xml into the jar file in 
it's "ejbjar" task. 
I could generate all the deployment descriptor files from the xdoclet, but ant 
doesn't know about them (jbosscmp-jdbc.xml). It knows only about jaws.xml which 
is an old cmp implementation of JBoss.
 Jar file that would be affected : optional.jar
and the source file to be modified would be 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.ejb.JbossDeploymentTool
creator: satheeshka@yahoo.com
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
We're working toward a better plugin method for tasks because tasks of all 
third party products creates too much work and not all committers have 
knowledge and time and software to work with everything available in the java 
world. The ultimate goal is to push all these tasks outside Ant to avoid 
dealing with such maintenance issues but concentrate on core, so this is 
unlikely that your request will be achieved if there is no submission and then 
this will probably be better to submit it to JBoss people.

creator: fender_rules@yahoo.co.kr
